To install and start Ganache, follow these steps:

1. Download Ganache from the link provided: https://truffleframework.com/ganache/
2. Install the downloaded package.
3. Open the program, and you will see an interface displaying accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
4. Click on "Settings" to configure IP binding, port (set to 8545), number of accounts, gas limit, etc.
5. Click on "Restart" for the settings to take effect.
6. Ganache will be running on your local machine, binding to port 8545.
